Class GuessingGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • GuessingGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnrestrictedGuessingGame

    public class GuessingGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Program in the form of the 20 Questions guessing game. Person thinks of an answer from list of items and computer will try to guess it.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String itemList

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuessingGame

        protected GuessingGame(GameTree<java.lang.String> tree,
                       java.lang.String fileName)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Constructs a new GuessingGame object. In other words, starts the guessing game. Continues to replay the game so long as user says "yes" or "y"
        Parameters:
        tree - binary tree containing string items
        fileName - name of file to be used in getFileName method
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException

    • Method Detail

      • printInstructions

        protected void printInstructions()
        Prints instructions so that subclass can override it

      • theActualGame

        protected void theActualGame(BinaryTreeNode<java.lang.String> node)
        Actually starts the game. Is overridden in subclass to implement different procedures as necessary.
        Parameters:
        node - current node

      • actualGameHelper

        protected void actualGameHelper(BinaryTreeNode<java.lang.String> node)
        Helper method for theActualGame method. Repeatedly calls theActualGame until it reaches an answer.
        Parameters:
        node - current node

      • getFileName

        protected java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String fileName)
        Gets name of file without the extension. Note that this only works for three-character-long file extensions.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file
        Returns:
        file name without extension

      • listOfAnswers

        protected java.lang.String listOfAnswers(GameTree<java.lang.String> tree)
        Creates a list of items to display during the game
        Parameters:
        tree - binary tree containing game backbone
        Returns:
        list of items as string

      • modifiedInOrderTraversal

        public void modifiedInOrderTraversal(BinaryTreeNode<java.lang.String> node)
        Helper method for listOfAnswers method. Is modified in a way that it traverses through binary tree until it finds a leaf, in which it adds to item list
        Parameters:
        node - current node

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Executes the program on runtime.
        Parameters:
        args - file name (xml)
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file is not found
